reviewText: If you are a Lionel hobbyist or just a train fancier, you will love this collection of DVD's.  It is amazing the variety of ways a person can enjoy their Lionel trains: from toys to realistic railroads.  The Lionel action keeps on going!

A great set, and reasonably priced.  Good filming and production standards. is a polished production.  Good film quality, but I would like it rereleased on bluray.  Has lots of large scale locomotives and impressively detailed layouts.
my husband likes it he likes train.
We love these DVDs already had 5-8.  Fast shipping
My son, who is so very much into model trains has watched this video multiple time.  He has enjoyed every minute!  Great delivery packaging, great fast delivery.  Nothing at all negative to offer.
